DOC.brief_summary: To Determine Safety Immunogenicity Oral ( Whole Cell ) Euvichol Cholera Vaccine Healthy Adult Men
DOC.brief_title: To Determine Safety Immunogenicity Oral ( Whole Cell ) Euvichol Cholera Vaccine Healthy Adult Men
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial open , non-comparative phase 1 clinical study healthy men design determine safety immunogenicity Euvichol ( Oral cholera vaccine )
DOC.criteria: Adult men 20years age More 45kg body weight ideal body weight within Â±20 % weight Screening conduct within 14 day investigational drug administration ( Vital Sign & Physical Examination , hematology blood coagulation test , blood chemistry test , urinalysis , 12lead ECG , etc . ) , result discretion investigator deem suitable participation clinical trial Written consent person determines participate clinical trial A person show hypersensitivity preventive vaccination past A person receive cholera vaccine past A person febrile illness infection disease , receive antibiotic within 2weeks start experiment A person gastrointestinal symptom diarrhea , abdominal pain , receive prescription drug within one week start experiment A person last two week symptom diarrhea , abdominal pain within 6months start experiment A person donate whole blood component blood within one month start experiment donor A person receive preventive vaccine within 2months start experiment A person receive blood product immune globulin preparation within 3months start experiment A person immune function disorder receive immunosuppressive treatment A person chronic illness progress Ongoing drug alcohol abuse ( Not 28 units/week drinking ) A person participate clinical trial treat investigational drug within 2months start experiment A person difficult participate clinical trial discretion investigator
